title: The RECAP Framework

definitions.Captioning Model: A model that generates captions for images
definitions.Image Generation Model: A model that generates images from text

summary: The RECAP Framework proposes relabeling the corpus with improved captions auto-generated by a custom I2T model to increase sample efficiency and enhance the understanding of relations between captions and images. The process involves fine-tuning an image-to-text captioning model on manually annotated images, using this model to recaption images in a training dataset, and then training an image generation model with the recaptioned dataset.
